content:
Okie dokie, little buddy! We make fun video with Loom and show super cool employee happy-fun software. Here's how:

1. Big screen: Find big screen, like TV but for work. Ask grown-up if need help.
2. Loom time: Go [www.loom.com](http://www.loom.com). Sign up or log in. Like open toy box!
3. Get Loom: Click big button "Download Loom." Like pick toy from box.
4. Put Loom on compooter: Follow steps, like puzzle.
5. Open happy-fun software: Click icon on compooter.
6. Loom cloud: Find fluffy Loom cloud on screen. Click for window.
7. Pick screen: Click "Screen" in Loom window. Choose what to show.
8. Red button: Click big red button "Start Recording." Like "play" on toy.
9. Show and tell: Record and talk about cool things software does. Speak slow and clear.
10. Stop: Click Loom cloud, press square button. Like stop sign.
11. Watch and share: Video ready! Watch, ask grown-up help share with friends.

Yay! You made Loom video with super cool employee happy-fun software. Great job, little buddy!
